messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "mindless cartoon drivel"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/25/2003 9:09:30 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Do you want to give us examples of mindless cartoon drivel? Cause we WILL tell you it has
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/25/2003 9:09:30 PM Eastern Standard Time,
flyerrod@... writes:


> I'm talking about some of the seemingly mindless cartoon dribble that
> has no obvious value. (Is this where you are now going to tell me it
> has great value in some way?) I dont mean that rudely, I just seem
> to be getting this all wrong.

Do you want to give us examples of mindless cartoon drivel? 'Cause we WILL
tell you it has some great value. Give examples. We'll give value! <G>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
